title: Sing (2016 American film)
summary: Sing is a 2016 American computer-animated musical comedy film[4] produced by Illumination Entertainment and released by Universal Pictures. It was written and directed by Garth Jennings, co-directed by Christophe Lourdelet[1] and stars the ensemble voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson, Nick Kroll, John C. Reilly, Taron Egerton, and Tori Kelly. Its characters are anthropomorphic animals, and it centers on Buster Moon, a struggling koala theater owner who decides to hold a singing competition, as well as how the competition interferes with the personal lives of its contestants. this is the first film of the franchise of the same name.
